short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension for blocking websites (for use with the Sleep or else app)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension that restricts access to websites when your sleep time is due. You can customize the websites, keywords and type of blocks through the Sleep or else application.

Application website: https://sleeporelse.com/

Please note that this extension cannot be used without the desktop application.
